newsitem.title: POLAND: Espebepe dives 28.4 pct as limits lifted.
newsitem.headline: Espebepe dives 28.4 pct as limits lifted.

text.p: Polish construction firm Espebepe SA plunged 28.4 percent to 3.65 zlotys after the bourse allowed it to trade without the regular daily 10-percent price fluctuation limit on Thursday.
The bourse decided to let the stock trade without price limit after no trades were carried out at the last three sessions because of excess supply.
Analysts have said Espebepe was hit by renewed fears it might face bankruptcy after a decision of its creditors on a possible debt write-off was put off from last Friday until April 14.
